descriptionHtml:
Nexus
Trixxxar

Description:
############
This little Mod changes the basic 4 Dmg Spell of all 3 Elements to do 3 times more Dmg. Be warned 
becauze NPC uses them too. :)

Features:
##############
-3 x Dmg for most Spells

Installing:
##############
- Extract .ESP to your Data folder and make sure it is checked in the DATA section of your Skyrim 
Launcher.

Removal:
#########
- unchecked the .ESP in the DATA section of your Skyrim Launcher.

ChangeLog:
############
-1.0 Release

Credits
#############
Bethesda
author: trixxxar
